channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Dead & Company to Celebrate Grateful Dead’s 60th Anniversary With San Francisco Concerts
item.description: 🌟 Let the good times roll! Dead & Company vibes coming atcha for Grateful Dead's 60th in San Francisco! 🌹🎶 #GratefulDead60th #DeadAndCompany

item.title: The Kooks Go Back to the Beginning
item.description: 🎶 Dive into nostalgia with @thekooksmusic as they revisit their roots! 🕰️ #TheKooks #MusicNews

item.title: Burna Boy Reveals Release Date for New Album, Shares New Song Featuring Travis Scott: Listen
item.description: 🔥 New music alert! 🎶 Burna Boy drops a collab with Travis Scott and sets release date for upcoming album! Get ready to vibe! 🚀 #BurnaBoy #TravisScott

item.title: Night Tapes Announce Debut Album portals // polarities: Hear “pacifico”
item.description: 🎶 Dive into dreamy vibes with Night Tapes' debut album portals // polarities! 🌌 Listen to the enchanting track "pacifico" now! 🌟 #NightTapes #NewMusicAlert

item.title: SZA Looking After Fans By Gifting Tickets, Confiscating Whippets
item.description: 🌟 SZA spreading love with ticket giveaways 🎶 Keep the music alive, no whippets allowed! 🚫 #MusicNews #SZA #SpreadLove
